LanguageData.SetUpCampDesc: Set up a camp, enabling you to forage, mine and hunt as well as reorganize your caravan.
LanguageData.SetUpCampFormedCamp: The caravan successfully set up a camp.
LanguageData.SetUpCampSettingsMapTimerDaysTooltip: Days until the caravan is forced to leave the map
LanguageData.SetUpCampSettingsTimeoutTooltip: Days until abandoned camps disappear and the tile can be used again
LanguageData.SetUpCampSettingsPermanentCamps: Enable permanent camps (default: false, disabling will remove empty camps!)
LanguageData.SetUpCampSettingsHomeEvents: Enable "normal map" events on camps (default: false)
LanguageData.SetUpCampAbandonDialogue: Are you sure you wish to permanently and irreversibly destroy this camp?
LanguageData.SetUpCampStillInUse: There are still colonists in the camp. You must form a caravan before abandoning the camp.
LanguageData.SetUpCampOccupied: You need to wait before setting up a camp at the same spot.
